title: Its a condensed, sans serif font.
content:
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y88N1U\_wHc4&list=UURP8\_d2CUiCqtx05o1MRtIQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025651/https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y88N1U_wHc4&list=UURP8_d2CUiCqtx05o1MRtIQ "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y88N1U\_wHc4&list=UURP8\_d2CUiCqtx05o1MRtIQ")

I know it's a video but I'm desperate and the image uploader isn't working for me. The font can be found at 00:01:40 of the video. I tried looking at the original edit but the title is a PNG file and Photoshop won't read the font.

Please help!

Thanks,

Brian
author: b_toke

comments.content:
It could be **[Triple Condensed Gothic (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/triple-condensed-gothic-rr/)** by Steve Jackaman [Red Rooster, 2002]

Here is a frame capture at 00:01:40:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025651im_/http:/typophile.com/files/colorem_6611.jpg)

I tend to agree Fivos. Working link [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/triple-condensed-gothic-rr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025651/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/triple-condensed-gothic-rr/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/triple-condensed-gothic-rr/")  
Don
Thanks Don, I fixed the link ;)
